availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Levin L. Shreve (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. )

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Maryland native. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twenty-four enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Resident of Louisville in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 333B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 869.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 353.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 281A.
"Levin Laurence Shreve (1793-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial 66748831, accessed July 10, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66748831.
